send(address,uint256,uint256,bytes,bytes.details: Locks asset on the chain and enables withdraw on the other chain.

params._amount: Amount to be transfered (note: the fee can be applyed).
params._autoParams: Auto params for external call in target network
params._chainIdTo: Chain id of the target chain.
params._permit: deadline + signature for approving the spender by signature.
params._useAssetFee: use assets fee for pay protocol fix (work only for specials token)
